title: react-easy-facebook
description: A React hook to facilitate working with Facebook's OAuth while providing a stellar Typescript implementation for for code hinting and specificity.

title: Indie Photographers
description: Indie Photographers is a hub for well, indie photographers. The app is a PWA created through create-react-app. The frontend is a React app with Material-UI on top. The backend is mostly a node RESTful API with Express on top and MongoDB for a database. It's important to mention that this is a concept app not an actual commercial product. Nevertheless, this is a perfect showcase and reflection of my skills at this point in my career.

title: Angular Todo
description: Angular Todo is a simple todo list application built using Angular. It has a Node backend with a Mongo database, deployed on Heroku as a Docker image. Check the README to know more.

title: AESChipions
description: AESChipions is a team effort between myself and Mohamed Nour. It was the final project of Chipions; which is a student program for digital design engineering. The project is basically an AES encryption system (counter mode) written entirely in Verilog.

title: CPU Schedule
description: A simulation for both First Come First Serve (FCFS) and Round Robin CPU scheduling algorithms, written in C++. Built as part of a college course (Operating Systems). Read the repository readme for more details.

title: Lyrics Genius
description: Lyrics Genius is tiny little app built using Musixmatch's free developer APIs. I built this in a day back when I started learning web development. It's built using React and Bootstrap.

title: Personal Website
description: This is the Website you're currently on. It was created using Gatsby and is purely a static website. You may think the design is minimal because I got lazy and I'm not a great web designer. And you'd be partially correct. But, I got better reasoning behind the minimal design, the website is built with speed and performance in mind. The project is stylized purely using SCSS. No external UI libraries were used (other than the drawer which is imported from material-ui).

title: todoNumeroUno
description: The magnum opus, the chef d'oeuvre, the masterpiece, my first ever todo list. Of course I was going to show off my first project ever. This bad boy is featuring React, and Bootstrap for the frontend, Node, and MongoDB for the backend. The quality is definately questionable but it's nice to reflect on this and think about how much better things are now.

title: Unix Shell
description: This is a simple Unix shell written in C++. C++ is thelanguage I mainly use for problem solving, simply because it'svery easy to build a performant solution using it. It's alsohowever very easy to miss up if not careful. You may check theproject repository by clicking the project title.
